article_title: Lawsuit filed over abortion services in HealthSource RI plans
article_text:
Lawsuit filed over abortion services in HealthSource RI plans

An anonymous Rhode Island man is suing HealthSource RI, claiming that his constitutional right to freedom of religion is being violated because all the exchange’s health plans charge for coverage of abortion...

article_metadata.description: An anonymous Rhode Island man is suing HealthSource RI, claiming that his constitutional  right to freedom of religion is being violated because all the exchange’s health plans charge for coverage of abortion...
